mapper.select: SELECT ST_NUM, ST_NAME, PHOTO_LINK, STAR_AVG, RV_COUNT FROM ( SELECT T.ST_NUM AS ST_NUM, T.ST_NAME AS ST_NAME, T.PHOTO_LINK AS PHOTO_LINK , AVG(STAR_SCORE) OVER (PARTITION BY T.ST_NUM) AS STAR_AVG, COUNT(*) OVER (PARTITION BY T.ST_NUM) AS RV_COUNT FROM ( SELECT ST.ST_NUM AS ST_NUM, IA.ST_NAME AS ST_NAME, P.PHOTO_LINK AS PHOTO_LINK , R.STAR_SCORE AS STAR_SCORE FROM ST_LIST ST JOIN IN_PROCESS IP ON ST.IN_PROCESS_NUM = IP.IN_PROCESS_NUM JOIN IN_APPLY IA ON IP.IN_APPLY_NUM = IA.IN_APPLY_NUM JOIN RV_BOX R ON R.ST_NUM = ST.ST_NUM JOIN ST_PHOTO P ON ST.ST_NUM = P.ST_NUM JOIN MAIN_PHOTO MP ON P.ST_PHOTO_NUM = MP.ST_PHOTO_NUM ) T ) WHERE ST_NUM IN (1,2,3)

SELECT F.ST_NUM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, T.ST_NUM FROM ( SELECT ST_NUM, COUNT(USER_NUM) AS COUNT FROM COMPARED_BOX WHERE USER_NUM IN ( SELECT U.USER_NUM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, I.* FROM ( SELECT USER_NUM, COUNT(TASTE_NUM) AS COUNT FROM USER_TASTE WHERE TASTE_NUM IN ( SELECT TASTE_NUM FROM USER_TASTE WHERE USER_NUM = '1' ) GROUP BY USER_NUM ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) I ) U WHERE ROWNUM<=5 ) AND ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -6) < REG_DATE GROUP BY ST_NUM ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) T ) F WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT F.ST_NUM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, ST_NUM FROM ST_KEY WHERE ST_KEY_NUM IN ( SELECT T.ST_KEY_NUM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, K.* FROM ( SELECT SK.ST_KEY_NUM, COUNT(ST.ST_NUM) AS COUNT FROM ST_KEY SK LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ST_NUM FROM LIKE_BOX WHERE USER_NUM='1' ) ST ON SK.ST_NUM = ST.ST_NUM GROUP BY SK.ST_KEY_NUM ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) K )T WHERE ROWNUM<=5 ) ORDER BY DBMS_RANDOM.RANDOM )F WHERE ROWNUM<=5

SELECT T.ST_NUM FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM, L.* FROM ( SELECT ST_NUM, COUNT(LIKE_NUM) AS COUNT FROM LIKE_BOX WHERE ADD_MONTHS(SYSDATE, -3) < REG_DATE AND REG_DATE <= SYSDATE GROUP BY ST_NUM ORDER BY COUNT DESC ) L ) T WHERE ROWNUM <= 5
